quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Fulu Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company primarily engaged in the provision of services to facilitate digital goods transactions and online store operating services. The Company operates its business through five segments. The Leisure and Entertainment segment is engaged in facilitating the sale of digital goods offered by leisure and entertainment content providers, operating services for online stores and providing other services. The Games segment is engaged in facilitating the sale of digital goods offered by game producers, operating services for online stores and providing other services. The Telecommunications segment is engaged in providing digital goods-related agency services and other services to telecom providers. The Lifestyle segment is engaged in facilitating the sale of digital goods offered by lifestyle service providers and providing other services. The Corporate Welfare segment is engaged in providing employee benefits solutions to corporate clients.
